metadata.title: CVE-2021-20187 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: It was found in Moodle before version 3.10.1, 3.9.4, 3.8.7 and 3.5.16 thatit was possible for site administrators to execute arbitrary PHP scriptsvia a PHP include used during Shibboleth authentication.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
